name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calendar Reminders: Event Notifications for Google Calendar™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Track attendee engagement & reduce meeting no-shows by 50%

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boost Attendance and Reduce No-Shows with Calendar Reminders.

Easily manage meeting reminders with automated notifications and real-time tracking to stay ahead of your schedule.

📅 Calendar Reminders lets you send timely reminders to all event participants from your Google Calendar—improving meeting attendance and reducing no-shows by over 50%. Plus, with reminder open tracking, you’ll know exactly when participants engage with your notifications.

💡 Keep attendees informed and organized with customizable reminder timings: send notifications one day before, 30 minutes before, or both!

⭐️ FEATURES

🚀 Maximize Attendance
Automatically send reminders to meeting participants, ensuring everyone remembers the meeting.

📆 Flexible Reminder Timing
Choose when your reminders are sent—one day before, 30 minutes before, or both.

🎯 Track Reminder Engagement
Get notified the moment participants open your reminders, giving you real-time insights into their engagement.

📧 Send Email Reminders
Notify participants via email directly from Google Calendar.

⚙️ Fully Integrated with Google Calendar
Seamlessly connects to your existing calendar, so you don’t have to switch tools.

🔔 Real-Time Alerts
Receive notifications when participants open your reminders or as event updates occur.

🛟 SUPPORT

Need help? Check out our comprehensive guides or get in touch at hello@calendar-reminders.com. Our team is ready to assist you.

💰 PRICING

Calendar Reminders offers both free and premium plans to meet your needs. Learn more at: https://www.calendar-reminders.com/pricing

🔐 PRIVACY

We respect your privacy and never store or access your personal data. Calendar Reminders is designed to work securely with your Google Calendar. View our full privacy policy here: https://www.calendar-reminders.com/privacy

This version integrates the reminder open tracking feature as a core benefit while keeping the structure concise and user-friendly.
